title: Crash-Fest at ‘Mini-Paris-Roubaix’ Prompts Reaction from CPA: ‘Was It a Cyclocross Race?’
content:
Video captures moment Stefan Küng crashes on rain-slicked cobbles in the mid-week French semi-classic: 'I did not see it coming.'

Read the full article at Crash-Fest at ‘Mini-Paris-Roubaix’ Prompts Reaction from CPA: ‘Was It a Cyclocross Race?’ on Velo.
author: ahood
